feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.36.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Fix windows info out of bounds panic by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3196

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.36.0...v0.36.1

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.36.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [relay] Don't start relay quic listener on invalid TLS config by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3202
  • [management] Fix network migration issue in Postgres by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3198
  • [management] add duration logs to Sync by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3203

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.36.1...v0.36.2

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.36.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Close ice agent only if not nil by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3210

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.36.2...v0.36.3

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.36.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Allow freebsd to build netbird-ui by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3212
  • [management] Refactor peers to use store methods by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2893
  • [misc] Fix: typo in test output by @JinxCappa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3216
  • [management] remove peer from group on delete by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3223
  • [management] disable prepareStmt for sqlite by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3228
  • [client] Fix freebsd default routes by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3230
  • [client] Use correct stdout/stderr log paths for debug bundle on macOS by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3231
  • [client] Back up corrupted state files and present them in the debug bundle by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3227
  • [client] Match more specific dns handler first by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3226
  • [client] Mark redirected traffic early to match input filters on pre-DNAT ports by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3205
  • [management] use account request buffer on sync by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3229
  • [management/signal/relay] add metrics descriptions by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3233
  • [client] Support port ranges in peer ACLs by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3232
  • [client] Use dynamic dns route resolution on iOS by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3243
  • [management] copy source and destination resource on policyRule copy by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3235

New Contributors

  • @JinxCappa made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3216

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.36.3...v0.36.4

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.36.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Replace engine probes with direct calls by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3195
  • Update sign pipeline version by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3246
  • [client] Add missing peer ACL flush by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3247

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.36.4...v0.36.5
